mapper.sql: baseUserId, serialNo, agentSerialNo, md5Key, merchantName, merchantType, printName, companyName, industryTypeId, industryType, range, contactMan, postcode, prov, city, area, address, serviceTel, webSite, applyForBusiness, auditStatus, auditMemo, endTime, businessLicense, registerNumber, identityType, identityCardOn, identityCardOff, terminals, serviceType, serviceAlipay, serviceWeixin, totalArea, totalEmployees, totalIncomes, operatePhoto, identityName, identityNum, identityBt, identityEt, organizeBarCode, organizeBarCodePic, organizeBarCodeBt, organizeBarCodeEt, taxBarCode, taxBarCodePic, taxBarCodeBt, taxBarCodeEt, cleanType, openBankProv, openBankCity, openBank, openBankSub, openBankName, openBankAccount, bankCardOn, bankCardOff, openBankLicense, signAccount, openBookingCard, industryRate, cappingMachine, weixinPayOnline, weixinPayOffline, aliPayOnline, aliPayOffline
mapper.select:
select merc.id as id, user.userName as userName, user.nickname as nickname, user.password as password, user.createdAt as createdAt, user.createdBy as createdBy, description,merc.status as status, merc.phone as phone, merc.tel as tel, merc.email as email,
from sys_merchant merc, sys_user user where merc.baseUserId = user.id and merc.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
